articles.title: Singapore Polytechnic students and staff to be tested for Covid-19 after 3 positive cases - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Singapore Polytechnic (SP) students and staff who were on campus on or after April 29 will undergo Covid-19 swab tests from Wednesday (May 19), after three students tested positive for the virus.
